mods.abstract: Two color window card (black and split fountain, yellow to red, on light brown) announcing the Harry Smith Project featuring Elvis Costello, Beck, Marianne Faithfull, Van Dyke Parks, Adam Dorn, Bob Neuwirth, Steve Earle, Robyn Holcomb, Bill Frisell, Gavin Friday, Philip Glass, Maurice Seezer, Smokey Hormel, the Folksmen, Don Byron, Mary Margaret O'Hara, Kate and Anna McGarrigle, T Bone Burnett and Sam Phillips, Richard Thompson, David Johansen, Larry Taylor, Todd Rundgran, Garth Hudson, Victoria Williams, David Thomas, Steven Hodges, Percy Heath, Eliza Carthy, Ralph Carney, and Eric Mingus at UCLA's Royce Hall in Los Angeles, California on April 25 and 26. Poster features woodcuts of a man with a guitar, a sun, and stars.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
